short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Learnics Chrome extension enables students to log site data and keep notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learnics is a digital research notebook that keeps your research notes and citations organized.

Learnics is more than just a citation generator. Learnics is a free digital research notebook that provides one spot for students to take notes,  tag websites, generate bibliographies and track all research activity for any online project or assignment.  Learnics is the perfect tool for a college student who is looking to stay organized and generate bibliographies for a research project and for students in grades 4-12 who need some help staying focused, organized and sharing resources with teachers and classmates during research assignments.   Additionally, Learnics notes, annotations and snapshot report features make Learnics the idea tool for AP Seminar and AP Research class. 


- Use your research pathway to easily create a bibliography in APA, MLA, or Chicago formats!
- Annotate and color code research on the fly!
- Embed annotations, create, & export notes.
- Use tags to organize visited websites.
- Auto generate formatted citations in MLA, APA, or Chicago.
- Bibliographies are tied directly to your research pathway to ensure your citations are authentic.
- Overall snapshot report for every session.
- Keep yourself on task and share the engagement data with the time tracker.

This extension is “Learnics” and it is intended to be freely used by students.  “Learnics”  also pairs with “Learnics Classroom Pro” which is a paid teacher chrome extension that allows teachers to create and share Learnics-enabled assignments with students.  “Learnics Classroom Pro” also allows teachers to gain access to their students notes, citations and check for authenticity.  Students can use “Learnics” for free, with or without being linked to a teacher who has purchased “Learnics Classroom Pro”. 

For more information, visit www.learnics.com

Learnics, Effortless Authenticity
